title: History lesson
brief_description: A song in the folk idiom about a history lesson illustrated with newsreel footage of recent historical events such as the first atomic bomb, Hitler, Nazi rallies, Neville Chamberlain, scenes of poverty in Asian countries, and the Vietnam War.
description: A song in the folk idiom about a history lesson illustrated with newsreel footage of recent historical events such as the first atomic bomb, Hitler, Nazi rallies, Neville Chamberlain, scenes of poverty in Asian countries, and the Vietnam War.
